title: United Airlines agrees to give union pilots big pay raises
description: United Airlines and its pilots' union say they have a deal on a new contract.

title: Hikers, others asked to watch for signs of escaped Pennsylvania inmate
description: A homicide suspect used bed sheets to escape from a northwest Pennsylvania jail.

title: Former leader of Brooklyn crime-control group pleads guilty to sexually abusing teenage girl
description: He faces a minimum of 14 years in prison after pleading guilty in federal court.

title: 4 dead in Georgia mass shooting, gunman remains at large: Police
description: Police said they are looking for 40-year-old Andre Longmore of Hampton in connection with the shooting of three men and a woman.

title: Tesla's 1st electric pickup has rolled off the assembly line, company says
description: Tesla says its first electric pickup has rolled off the assembly line

title: Search underway for woman who reported toddler walking on highway
description: Alabama police are searching for Carlethia "Carlee" Nichole Russell, 25, who went missing after she reported seeing a child walking on the side of a highway.

title: Europe sizzles under heat wave that's only going to get worse
description: Scorching temperatures across Europe have forced the closure of the Acropolis in Athens for a second day

title: Israel's Prime Minister Netanyahu rushed to hospital, his office says
description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's office says he has been rushed to a hospital but that he is in “good condition” as he undergoes a medical evaluation

title: Marketa Vondrousova defeats Ons Jabeur to win the Wimbledon women's championship
description: Marketa Vondrousova has become the lowest-ranked woman to win Wimbledon, defeating 2022 runner-up Ons Jabeur 6-4, 6-4 in the final

title: Fire triggers explosions at La. chemical plant; residents warned to stay indoors
description: Officials say a fire at a Louisiana chemical plant triggered explosions that shook homes several miles away and sent flames and smoke billowing into the air

title: How investigators say they connected the dots that led to Gilgo Beach murder arrest
description: For the last year and a half, Long Island investigators said they honed in on the man who they say is a prime suspect in some of the 2010 cold case murders.

title: Torrential rains in South Korea kill at least 7 in landslides and floods
description: Two days of heavy rain in South Korea have killed at least seven people and left two others missing in landslides and floods

title: Mega Millions jackpot grows to $640 million, among highest in lottery game’s history
description: The Mega Millions top prize has grown again to an estimated $640 million after there was no winner of the lottery’s latest giant jackpot

title: 1 police officer dead, 2 other cops in critical condition in North Dakota shooting
description: Police in Fargo, North Dakota, say one of their own was killed in a shooting Friday, an incident that also critically injured two other officers and two civilians.

title: Southern California firefighters battle 3 wildfires amid hot, dry weather
description: Firefighters in Southern California are battling three separate brush fires that started Friday afternoon amid the hottest weather of the year so far

title: WATCH:  19-foot Burmese python caught in Florida
description: A Burmese python measuring 19 feet long, confirmed as the new world record by officials at the Conservancy of Southwest Florida, was captured and killed by snake hunters.
